items.title: Detections: Agents
items.description:
- Agents will now get their detection rules assigned with the oldest running rules first.
- Only detection rules that need to be runned will be returned on each Agent call to get assigned detections.
- During each run cycle, Detection Agents will only fetch rule configurations for the number of rules matching the max_concurrent_rules setting.
- Detection agents will now bulk update detection metrics/stats after detection rules finish instead of updating each rule one at at time, this should alleviate detection pressure on the API.

items.title: Multiple Bug Fixes
items.description:
- A bug in detection field calculations in 2024.01.12 created a corner case where Detections leveraging inputs that did not have their own field mappings defined would result in no fields being returned and the Detection would fail to run entirely.
- When processing an event rule if the target value list was empty the entire rule would fail when using the contains operator.
